row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ELSE : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER : ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Host : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Application Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Update Type : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Update Type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! New File Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "New File Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! File Location : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Location" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_RELATIVE_APP_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Context-Root : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Context-Root" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_CONTEXT_ROOT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Binding : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Binding" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_BINDING#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Generate Default Bindings : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Generate Default Bindings" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_DEF_BINDING#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Override Existing Bindings : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Override Existing Bindings" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_OVERRIDE_BINDING#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! New Binding File Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Specific bindings file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_BINDING_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Virtual Host Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Virtual Host Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_VIRTUAL_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------------------Validations--------------------------------------------------
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# = "Replace or add a single module" OR "Replace or add a single file" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_RELATIVE_APP_PATH# = "" : STOP MSG, 51, "File Location cannot be empty if you want to replace or add a module or file" : ENDIF : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------------------Forming the command--------------------------------------------
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#\wsadmin.bat" : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#/wsadmin.sh" PATH=$PATH:&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#;export PATH : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX : ENDIF : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION
: INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = "java -jar ""&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar"" arb -cmd execute &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"
! Username : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -password &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# <> "" ! Host : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#," -host &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Port : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -port &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Attach python file to prepare running : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "UPDATE_APPLN_ADV", T : SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_update_appln_adv.py") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -f ""&FILENAME#""")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#""") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#""")
! Array list to include in the command ! Application name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Update type : SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.VARA.UPDATE_TYPE" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&ATTRIBUTE#""")
! operation and contentURI : SET &OPTIONS# = "" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# = "Replace or add a single module" OR "Replace or add a single file" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_RELATIVE_APP_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_UNIX_SLASH : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, "-operation addupdate -contenturi \'&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#\'") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# = "Replace the entire application" : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, "-operation update") : ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_UNIX_SLASH : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -contents \'&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#\'")
! bindings : IF &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# = "Replace the entire application" OR "Replace or add a single module" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_BINDING# <> ""
: SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.VARA.BINDING_TYPE" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_WAS_BINDING# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : IF &ATTRIBUTE# <> "-" : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " ""&ATTRIBUTE#""") : ENDIF
! binding type : IF &UC4RB_WAS_DEF_BINDING# = 'YES' : IF &UC4RB_WAS_BINDING# <> "Use existing bindings" : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -usedefaultbindings")
! override existing bindings : IF &UC4RB_WAS_OVERRIDE_BINDING# = 'YES' : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -defaultbinding.force") : ENDIF
! Specific bindings file : IF &UC4RB_WAS_BINDING_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_BINDING_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_UNIX_SLASH : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -defaultbinding.strategy.file \'&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#\'") : ENDIF
! default virtual host : IF &UC4RB_WAS_VIRTUAL_HOST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_VIRTUAL_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -defaultbinding.virtual.host &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: ENDIF : ENDIF
: ENDIF : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_UPDATE_TYPE# = "Replace or add a single module" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_CONTEXT_ROOT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_CONTEXT_ROOT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_UNIX_SLASH : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, " -contextroot \'&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#\'") : ENDIF : ENDIF
! logging the command : PRINT &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# "&OPTIONS#"
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# "&OPTIONS#"
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** UPDATE APPLICATION ADVANCED STATUS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** UPDATE APPLICATION ADVANCED STATUS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
